    HydroEnR-Welcome

    HydroEnR-Welcome.Rmd

    Welcome to the HydroEnR package

    Currently this is just a test page but more documentation will be added over time.

    To load the package use;

    library(HydroEnR)
#> 
#> Attaching package: 'HydroEnR'
#> The following object is masked from 'package:stats':
#> 
#>     window

    QMED

    Let’s import some QMED data from NRFA, the site we’ll use is ‘St Johns Beck at Thirlmere Reservoir’ - ID: 75001

    For this we will require the rnrfa package and magrittr

    library(rnrfa)
#> Warning: package 'rnrfa' was built under R version 4.0.5
library(magrittr)
#> Warning: package 'magrittr' was built under R version 4.0.5
data <- rnrfa::get_ts(id = 75001, type = 'amax-flow') %>% getAMAX()
data
#>      Year   AMAX
#>     <num>  <num>
#>  1:  1974 16.243
#>  2:  1975 24.027
#>  3:  1976  0.818
#>  4:  1977  8.913
#>  5:  1978 20.196
#>  6:  1979  1.235
#>  7:  1980 21.760
#>  8:  1981 25.240
#>  9:  1982 17.417
#> 10:  1983 16.079
#> 11:  1984  3.632
#> 12:  1985 10.674
#> 13:  1986 38.943
#> 14:  1987 25.794
#> 15:  1988 16.658
#> 16:  1989 36.551
#> 17:  1990 21.651
#> 18:  1991 21.781
#> 19:  1992  1.497
#> 20:  1993 10.572
#> 21:  1994 14.790
#> 22:  1995 46.124
#> 23:  1996  7.035
#> 24:  1997 11.539
#> 25:  1998  9.451
#> 26:  1999 27.152
#> 27:  2000 22.193
#> 28:  2001 24.599
#> 29:  2002 22.977
#> 30:  2003  0.652
#> 31:  2004 17.888
#> 32:  2005 47.746
#> 33:  2006  6.333
#> 34:  2007 32.431
#> 35:  2008 19.742
#> 36:  2009 31.950
#> 37:  2010 59.840
#> 38:  2011  8.695
#> 39:  2012 10.780
#> 40:  2013 22.058
#> 41:  2014 20.196
#> 42:  2015 23.304
#> 43:  2016 75.353
#> 44:  2017  1.710
#> 45:  2018  2.832
#> 46:  2019 20.839
#> 47:  2020 28.101
#>      Year   AMAX

    To find the QMED we will use the QMED function;

    qmed <- QMED(data)
qmed
#> [1] 20.196

    Now we’ll make a pplot of the data

    plotQMED(data)
#> [1] Estimated QMED: 20.196 cumecs
